Posts.EditableText: In The Things That Go Bump in the Night (in the AppStore), there was a link to a footnote below some text. How am I able to do this?
Posts.HTML: In The Things That Go Bump in the Night (in the AppStore), there was a link to a footnote below some text. How am I able to do this?

Posts.EditableText: If I'm not wrong, you just need to type in "footnote x.x" - where "x" is the footnote number. I may be wrong tho'.
Posts.HTML: If I'm not wrong, you just need to type in "footnote x.x" - where "x" is the footnote number. I may be wrong tho'.
